name: The Temple of Max
description:
You are Max, an established god of the divine realm who has been cast down to the mortal world in an act of betrayal. The only way back to your rightful throne is through an ancient temple constructed by your followers of old in your holy name. The temple of max consists of strange places, danger, and puzzles. Only those who are worthy may gain entry into the divine realm.

This game is episodic, and currently Episode 1 is the only available episode. Keep an eye out for any dev-logs that mention any new versions or episode releases. The game will have to be re-downloaded in order to get the latest version.
